data.description: A project-based introduction to the examination of user experience, and is oriented toward practical methods for approaching a design problem. The focus of the course is to develop conceptual design based on the needs of users. Students will receive grounding in user research methods, design sketching, and design validation.
data.title: USER EXPERIENCE FOR GRAPHIC DESIGN

data.description: An introduction to a range of digital media techniques for artists and designers, including digital imaging, vector graphics, web design and 3D digital modeling.  Emphasis on creative development along with technical skill building.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DIGITAL FORMS

data.description: Covers the theory and practice of designing newspapers, magazines, books, and other narrative forms. Emphasis will be placed on advanced typographic theory, and advanced digital and manual production skills.
data.title: GRAPHIC DESIGN FOR PUBLICATIONS

data.description: Examines the major developments in graphic design and typography as the fields slowly emerged and began to define themselves during the 19th, 20th, and 21st centuries.
data.title: HISTORY OF GRAPHIC DESIGN AND TYPOGRAPHY

data.description: Explore creative visual interface and interactive storytelling for the Web.
data.title: GRAPHIC DESIGN FOR INTERACTIVE MEDIA

data.description: Introduces the basic principles of graphic design. Develop an initial understanding of formal, conceptual, and technical aspects of the field. Emphasis will be given to the importance of working process, presentation and craftsmanship.
data.title: BASIC GRAPHIC DESIGN

data.description: Provides an introduction to the fundamentals of two-dimensional design. Develop a clear understanding of visual communication through problem-solving and formal and conceptual experimentation. Learn the elements and principles of design and manipulate those using analog and digital processes. Introduction to the Adobe Creative Suite of products, including InDesign, Illustrator, and (to a lesser degree) Photoshop. Serves as an introduction to professional presentation skills and techniques to hone craftsmanship.
data.title: TWO-DIMENSIONAL DESIGN
